author: 96.1 Renfrew Today
title: Ground News - Winter storm fails to deter the fearless friends of Gouldhaven Farms
text: Winter storm fails to deter the fearless friends of Gouldhaven Farms Local farmers were able to hold an important fundraiser just ahead of the massive snowstorm on Friday night. A special benefit and silent auction were held Friday evening at the Renfrew Armouries in support of the Gould family, who lost their dairy farm to a massive fire back in December. Angela Field, a fellow farmer who was part of the organizing group for the benefit, has revealed on social media that the event raised almost $55,000, with som… Summary by 96.1 Renfrew Today 1 Articles 1 Articles All Left Center Right [] 96.1 Renfrew Today Winter storm fails to deter the fearless friends of Gouldhaven Farms Local farmers were able to hold an important fundraiser just ahead of the massive snowstorm on Friday night.
